fields.summary:
With the coronavirus pandemic ongoing, it looks like remote working may be here to stay—which means lots and lots of Zoom meetings. Since video calling is our new normal, it’s time we had an etiquette guide for our post-COVID world.

Spoiler alert: keep your trousers on and mute your mic.
fields.title: The Remote Meeting Etiquette Guide

tags.summary: We've been working remotely for ages, and we love thinking about how to stay healthy, happy, and productive as a remote worker, whether you're exploring the world or just working on building a better work-life balance.
